entries.title: To the Lighthouse

entries.title: Mrs. Dalloway

entries.summary: As Clarissa Dalloway walks through London on a glorious June day, her movements bring together a cast of friends and strangers, each in turn weighing matters of mind and heart.

entries.title: Jacob’s Room

entries.summary: The coming-of-age of a young man in pre-war England, told by the impressions of those around him.
